Name: Harpoon
About the game: A diver and part-time hunter, dives under the water in search of adventures, but everything turned out not as he expected and incredible difficulties await him! Harpoon - Top Down Shooter, a game where the player will have to dive into the endless depths of the sea as a diver and face thousands of predatory marine life, shooting back at them, pumping their weapons and equipment, gaining points and passing more and more, setting new records! Features of the game: - Beautiful Style - Dynamic Passing - Rising Waves - Improvements Control: - Swim - 'W' - Acceleration - 'SHIFT' - Turn - 'A'/ 'D' - Harpoon shooting 'SPACE'
